import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-course-category', templateUrl: './add-course-category.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-course-category.component.css'] }) export class AddCourseCategoryComponent { }

Add new course category

Please fill the form below.

Course name is required.

Course name must be at least 5 characters long.

You are not registered? Register
